post.description: Call serializer update on an array of billing records

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this product.

get.description: Return a list of product usages for which there is no expense code authorized

username.title: Username
username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.

is_active.title: Active
is_active.description: Designates whether this user should be treated as active. Unselect this instead of deleting accounts.

percent.title: Percent
percent.description: Percent of charge that should be applied to this account for the user product

code.title: Code
code.description: Account code (e.g. expense code or PO number)

name.title: Name
name.description: Short, human readable name for this code

root.title: Root
root.description: If it is an expense code, the last 5 digits

username.title: Username
username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.

error_message.title: Error message
error_message.description: Error message from processing into billing record.

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: Text description of the rate used to calculate the charge

rate.description: Text description of the rate used to calculate the charge

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the facility (e.g. Helium Recovery Service)

application_username.title: Application username
application_username.description: Username that permits logging in to the facility application (e.g. nice)

invoice_prefix.title: Invoice prefix
invoice_prefix.description: Prefix used in the invoice names for the facility.
